long_description: The women's Gregory Maya 22 Pack is built light for moving fast in the mountains. No matter what your plan is for the day, this pack can expand or compress to fit your gear. Women-specific design. Top pocket includes a zippered mesh security compartment. Main compartment has 2 mesh organizer pockets with a key clip. Side compression with wing for added stability. Expandable front pocket with bungee closure will fit a helmet. 2 external side pockets; dual quick-access hipbelt pockets. The Gregory Maya 22 Pack features a sunglasses stash on shoulder harness.
short_description: The women's Gregory Maya 22 Pack is built light for moving fast in the mountains. No matter what your plan is for the day, this pack can expand or compress to fit your gear.
